title: Who was responsible for this?
body:
http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/uni-clubs/#why-join

So just to clarify, are we meeting players in Asia or Australia...? Also Mac's, really? Like sure there are some mentally challenged human beings who for whatever reason purchased a Mac and choose to play games on it but promoting that horrible decision, that's practically worse then Hitler. 

All seriousness how did this picture ever make it onto the "meet players" pic of your uni crap?
